text: Hey, did you hear anything back from them?

Hey sorry for the slow replies, it’s been a busy few weeks, i asked around and my friend who’s applied to the same place told me that we will know by tomorrow. They must have got a lot of people applying. I’ll let you know if I hear anything from them tomorrow. If I don’t get it I really don’t know what to do over the summer, I’d like some work experience or internship but don’t really know the best way of finding a good one

Don't be daft. I was feeling guilty that I hadn't been in touch. Is there anything I can do that is helpful for you? I am in a Netflix delivery at the mo which is pretty intense but always time for you!!
I didn’t get the 2D background artist internship which I didn’t really expect to get to be honest so now I’ve just got to wait for them to tell me if I got the 2D animator
What do you think I should do if I don’t get them, do you know any place that are good for internships ?
